Array: * While monsters are mostly made\n  of magic,^05 human beings are\n  mostly made of water.
* Humans,^05 with their physical\n  forms,^05 are far stronger\n  than us.
* But they will never know\n  the joy of expressing\n  themselves through magic.
* They'll never get a bullet-\n  pattern birthday card...
* I've never gotten a\n  bullet-pattern birthday\n  card before...?
* Prolly cuz no one\n  knows how to make\n  one at home.
* Well,^05 this book says\n  we're made of magic,^05\n  like back home.
* And we're able to\n  cast magic here,^05 so...
